Top_n_words: race - horse - winner - weight - chase - year - runner - handicap - fence - lottery
original_text: Today’s #IrishGrandNational is the last of the staying chases this season. Once again the trends show that you need to go for a lightly weighted horse. Our Duke won off 11st 4lb in 2017 but that was only the second winner over 10st 13lb since Commanche Court won the race in 2000.
